name: 韓秉軒
objective:
本課程主要探究虛擬實境與擴增實境應用中，佔有十分重要地位的 360 度全景影像攝影及動態影像製作。包括 360 度攝影原理介紹、器材入門、攝影練習、編輯工具介紹等等。
This course explore virtual reality and augmented reality applications, it occupies a very important position in the 360-degree panoramic image photography and motion picture production. Including 360-degree photography principle introduced, entry equipment, photographic practice, presentation editing tools and so on.
schedule:
Week1_課程介紹
Week2_VR 環境架設
Week3_虛擬實境與全景影片簡介
Week4_Appreciation of Immersive Storytelling
Week5_Writing Your Immersive Storytelling
Week6_Making Your VR Storyboard
Week7_補假
Week8_VR Storytelling Techniques
Week9_期中專題報告 (期末專題提案)
Week10_Unity Timeline
Week11_專家分享
Week12_Audio, Particle, 360 CG Video
Week13_看相關展覽
Week14_VR 腳本設計與討論 I
Week15_VR 拍攝與討論 I
Week16_VR 腳本設計與討論 II
Week17_VR 拍攝與討論 II
Week18_期末專題展演
scorePolicy:
作業 20%
期中報告 30%
期末專題提案 15%
期末專題成果報告 10%
期末專題成果展示 15%
平時表現 10%
remarks: 本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
